Description:
Detects base64 encoded .NET reflective loading of Assembly

Author: Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems), pH-T (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell Base64 Encoded Reflective Assembly Load
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%wwbsaguazgbsaguaywb0agkabwbuac4aqqbzahmazqbtagiabab5af0aoga6aewabwbhagqaka%' or command like '%saugblagyabablagmadabpag8abgauaeeacwbzaguabqbiagwaeqbdadoaogbmag8ayqbkacga%' or command like '%bafiazqbmagwazqbjahqaaqbvag4algbbahmacwblag0aygbsahkaxqa6adoatabvageazaaoa%' or command like '%afsacgblagyabablagmadabpag8abgauageacwbzaguabqbiagwaeqbdadoaogaoaciatabvageazaaiac%' or command like '%bbahiazqbmagwazqbjahqaaqbvag4algbhahmacwblag0aygbsahkaxqa6adoakaaiaewabwbhagqaigap%' or command like '%awwbyaguazgbsaguaywb0agkabwbuac4ayqbzahmazqbtagiabab5af0aoga6acgaigbmag8ayqbkaciak%' or command like '%wwbsaguazgbsaguaywb0agkabwbuac4aqqbzahmazqbtagiabab5af0aoga6acgaigbmag8ayqbkaciakq%' or command like '%saugblagyabablagmadabpag8abgauaeeacwbzaguabqbiagwaeqbdadoaogaoaciatabvageazaaiacka%' or command like '%bafiazqbmagwazqbjahqaaqbvag4algbbahmacwblag0aygbsahkaxqa6adoakaaiaewabwbhagqaigapa%' or command like '%wwbyaguazgbsaguaywb0agkabwbuac4ayqbzahmazqbtagiabab5af0aoga6aewabwbhagqaka%' or command like '%sacgblagyabablagmadabpag8abgauageacwbzaguabqbiagwaeqbdadoaogbmag8ayqbkacga%' or command like '%bahiazqbmagwazqbjahqaaqbvag4algbhahmacwblag0aygbsahkaxqa6adoatabvageazaaoa%')
